Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 201st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Jeffery Wert (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off Edson Botella (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2015, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/3/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2016...
Hit 3 homeruns against Cincinnati, driving in 8 runs on 4/7/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2017, hitting .565 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Philadelphia to Chicago on 6/25/2018 (Going to PHI: P Gale Otterson, CF Danny Suarez. Going to CHI: C Carlos Villanueva, P Shayne Funk)...
Injured on 7/6/2018 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 7/30/2018 (Going to CHI: 2B Bill Scott, C Eric Heiser, P Daniel Hutchings. Going to NY: C Carlos Villanueva, P Shayne Funk, 1B Tomas Mejia)...
10/23/2018: Signed a contract extension with New York , $11,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Traded from New York to Houston on 4/16/2019 (Going to HOU: C Carlos Villanueva. Going to NY: P Lee Wyrick, P Alberto Fresno)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/3/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $2,874,745 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 6/21/2021.
Traded from San Francisco to New York on 7/10/2022 (Going to NY: C Carlos Villanueva. Going to SF: RF Francisco Monte)...
10/5/2022: Signed a contract extension with New York , $3,500,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/14/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
